sourcesContent:
SKILLS

  • FRAMEWORKS

    Angular , Spring boot, Bootstrap, React Native, ASP.NET, ExpressJS

  • PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES

    HTML, CSS, JS, TS, Java, Python, PHP, SQL, UML

  • DATABASE MANAGEMENT

    MySQL, MongoDB

  • TOOLS

    IntelliJ, Postman, Visual Studio Code, Android Studio, Apache NetBeans, Git

  • RELEVANT COURSEWORK

    AGILE, Devops, Cloud, IOT, Sécurité, AI, Big Data, ISTQB

  • LANGUAGES

    English, French, Arabic
